package.name: image_unwarp
package.description: A package for calibrating and unwarping omnidirectional camera images taken with a mirror. Polynomial interpolation symmetric around a center point creates a function that can describe the entire image warping process based on a picture with a given set of points. OpenCV can use a chessboard to find such points in a calibration image as long as the points on the chessboard intersect with the center point.
